terms.definition: Karnofsky Performance Status Scale standardized character result for KPSS0101-Dead.

terms.preferredTerm: Karnofsky Performance Status Scale KPSS0101 Standardized Character Result 100

terms.preferredTerm: Karnofsky Performance Status Scale KPSS0101 Standardized Character Result 20

terms.preferredTerm: Karnofsky Performance Status Scale KPSS0101 Standardized Character Result 30
